text: Ezɨ gumazir fofozir aghuir Godɨn Nguibamɨn izezim iniziba, me arazir kabagh ami: Faragha zuir arazim, me zurara nɨghnɨzir zuezibar gɨn zui. Egha me igharaz darazi ko navir vamɨran iti, egha gumazibar asughasusi. Egha me gumazir igharazibar akaba barasi. Me igharaz darazir apangkuva egha arazir aghuibar me gami. Egha me arazir kamra gumaziba bar me gami. Egha me arazir aghuibar gɨn ghua ifarir puvatɨ. Me bar guizbangɨra dar gɨn zui.
